name: GET_asm-groups-group_id
description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve a single suppression group.**

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

group_id.description: The ID of the suppression group you would like to retrieve.

$ul: **description**: A brief description of your suppression group. Required when creating a group.
**is_default**: Indicates if you would like this to be your default suppression group.
**name**: The name of your suppression group. Required when creating a group.
**id**: The ID of the suppression group.
**unsubscribes**: The number of unsubscribes, or suppressions, in this group.
